title: St José Luis Sánchez del Río Novena

days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

Saint José Luis, though just a boy, you courageously shed your blood for Christ and received the crown of martyrdom.
Pray for us here in the Church Militant, as we fight against the enemies of Christ and His Church, and especially for the intention I now offer (mention your request here…)
Amen.

Concluding Prayer

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be
St Jose Luis Sanchez del Rio, pray for us!
